page.title: 19LIFE STYLES - Child's Day
page.content: On Saturday morning I was in bed and Mark(brother) & Mum were down stairs. Mum told Mark to come & fetch me so he did. I said I would get cold so Mark pulled me off the bed & down stairs, Mum brought my clothes down so I put them on. Then Dad came down stairs. Mum was making Dad's porridge for breakfast, I had my breakfast. After breakfast Dad went to the bathroom to clean his teeth, also his hands and face, then he put his boots .While Dad was doing this I went to have a wash. I went with Dad to Longcliffe, I saw Julie(my friend)there, & asked Dad if I could go to play with her, he said yes. We went silaging, Julie and I were holding silage bags down and we got messy. Julie showed me a dead cat Julie's Mum was burying it. We all went down to the house and Julie gave me some sweets, we then went back up .
